name: Book Club
description: Discuss books, authors, and stories every week.

name: Coding Club
description: Build projects and learn programming together.

name: Art Club
description: Draw, paint, and share creative ideas.

name: Music Club
description: Play instruments, sing, and share music.

name: Photography Club
description: Capture moments, learn techniques, and share photos.

name: Science Club
description: Conduct experiments and explore new scientific ideas.

name: Drama Club

name: Environmental Club
description: Promote sustainability and organize eco-friendly projects.

name: Chess Club
description: Play chess, compete, and improve your strategy skills.
